licence_overview:
To provide social housing with grant you may need to register with the [Homes and Community Agency.](http://www.homesandcommunities.co.uk/ourwork/regulation "Homes and Communities Agency Regulation"){:rel="external"} 

If so, you will need to comply with Home and Communities Agency's rules about your financial affairs, constitution and management arrangements.
licence_short_description: The Social Housing Provider Registration is for those who want to provide social housing with a grant.
overview: You need to register with the Homes and Communities Agency to provide social housing
title: Social Housing Provider Registration
will_continue_on: the Homes and Communities Agency website
